Sentencas: This study concerns numerical investigation of a solid oxide electrolysis stack, in which the cells are pressurized on only the fuel side (single-sided mode) or both fuel and air sides (double-sided mode).
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: A 90-cell stack model is used to study the effects of the operating pressure on the polarization curves, area-specific-resistance (ASR), temperature, and pressure.
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: The model predicts higher open-circuit voltage (OCV), lower ASR, and lower pressure drops over the flow fields at higher operating pressures.
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: The latter leads to flexibility in the flow field design.
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: The results show that the single-sided mode hinders the OCV increase and reduces the ASR.
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: Nonetheless, the ASR reduction under the double-sided mode is more significant than the single-sided mode.
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: Therefore, the double-sided mode performs better at high current densities since its higher ASR reduction provides a lower increase in the stack voltage (/input power).
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: Moreover, the results indicate a nonlinear relationship between the temperature distribution and the operating pressure under the double-sided mode due to its counteracting effects on the ohmic heat sources and reaction heat sink.
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: It is illustrated that the temperature difference over the stack decreases under the double-sided mode at higher operating pressures and lower current densities.& COPY; 2023 The Authors Published by Elsevier Ltd on behalf of Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Titulo: Modeling of single- and double-sided high-pressure operation of solid oxide electrolysis stacks
